name: RGB BAY
description:
The bay with crazy colors has been invaded by a deadly wormy aliens. You have to save the RGB BAY! Use your gun and your special abilities to finish a lot of maze-like levels full of traps, portals and doors. The RGB bay becomes more and more filled with water, work fast - do not waste your precious oxygen.

A large area of the bay is flooded with water, you have to dive/sink quickly and watch out for oxygen loss. There are places where there is a little air and you have to ascend to zero the loss of oxygen.

Black and white spheres will give you unique powers and will help you explore these mazes. The game is a fast paced platformer: jumping, shooting and sometimes minding... where is a way to a portal? 

- 32 medium levels and a final boss!

- 4 unique worlds, each having 8 levels 

- autosave after every four levels you beat 

- shoot, jump, collect keys and... be careful for a plenty of traps! 

- beware of low oxygen

 - 8 bit retro pixel graphics and crazy colors! 

- game without music and sounds 

- be prepared to die a lot! Have a great fun! 

Current version [v2] includes tutorial and one, and half two world - 12 levels. In about a month version [v3] will include all levels: tutorial and four worlds - 32 levels and boss!
